parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You must specify only one of the following parameters: vpcId, namespace ID, and application ID.

parameters.name: NacosInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the MSE Nacos instance. This parameter is required when the registry type is set to MSE Nacos.

parameters.name: NacosNamespaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the MSE Nacos namespace. This parameter is required when the registry type is set to MSE Nacos.

parameters.name: NamespaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace. You must specify only one of the following parameters: VPC ID, namespace ID, and application ID.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the returned page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: RegistryType
parameters.description:
The registry type. Valid values:

*   **0**: SAE Nacos
*   **1**: SAE built-in Nacos
*   **2** :MSE Nacos
*   **9**: SAE Kubernetes service

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the VPC. You must specify only one of the following parameters: VPC ID, namespace ID, and application ID.
